english.segment1: (chorus). its a cool break, u know I cant wait. every day's like a Sunday and we're. hearing the radio playing. take the long way. under the sun to our cool summer song
english.segment2: sun is rising and the day is here. we'll celebrate so don't be late, the time is near. grab your friends and like a rocket we're there. to where the party charges up every year. where we laugh forever
english.segment3: taste the perfect weather. everyone together. pack your bags for the memories we make. so lets jet out today
english.segment5: cruising underneath a cloudless sky. when we feel the sand, we know we've arrived. everyday and every wave's a sweet ride. we will take out time until the tide says goodbye. we will all remember
english.segment6: these days are just like heaven. in our minds we fly there. pack ur bags for the memories we make. so lets jet out today. (chorus)
english.segment7: cool summer song. good times we love. like heaven forever. the purest perfection
